ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 249
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is how it worked for most of the early phases of Beta. I was one of the few brave enough to play a Bard back then.  They were one of the last to get
ygData.messageBody:
> But.. on the other hand, if the songs affect everyone that can hear them,
> then they would logically affect the mobs you're fighting as well. And think
> of all the complaining that would arrise from Bards being able to
> mana-lessly heal and buff other players just by standing next to them.

This is how it worked for most of the early phases of Beta.

I was one of the few brave enough to play a Bard back then. They were one
of the last to get tuned...

Imagine what would happen if Selos sped up the monsters. It used to...
This was back when all monsters attacked, even the green ones...

Boy did I make some big ol' trains in Blackburrow back then.

- Luvas of Fennin Ro.
